page.title: 16RELIGION
page.content: Chapels and Churches Cont. {Tabernacl}(Babtist) is the smallest chapel as regards members-there are 18 of them ,and no Minister.The cause was started in Talybont in 1803 and the members met in each others homes until the chapel was built in 1812.Under the deacons seat there is a font where the members are baptised. The present St David's Church was built in 1909,but there was an earlier mission church built of corrugated zinc on a diffrent site.The house wich now stands on the particular is called 'Henllan'(Old Church).There are 62 members at St David's and the Parish Church is Llanfihangel Genau'r Glyn,some two miles away.At one time there was a Curate in charge living in Talybont,but for many years now the church has been looked after by the Vicar of Llanfihangel.
